name: Entrance
desc: The Portcullis is slammed shut. There is a pulley system that is missing a lever.

name: North Hallway
desc: Statues of past kings in armor, torches and banners.

name: South Hallway
desc: Suits of armor line the sides of the hallway, it almost seems as if they want to lunge out at you.

name: Central Hallway
desc: A long corridor filled with gothic paintings, you see an image of a pale orphan, her eyes seem to follow you.

name: Living Room
desc: A fireplace with years of ash and scorch marks dominates the room. An old book sits on a table.

name: Armory
desc: Shields, swords, bows and arrows are stacked on shelves and scattered across the ground.

name: Bedroom
desc: A big canopy bed sits in the middle of the room, it is riddled with spider webs and dust.

name: Pantry
desc: You see odd items, nothing looks edible. Rats scurry around your feet.

name: Kitchen
desc: A place used to prepare meals, the cutlery is old and rusted.

name: Dining
desc: A painting of a family sits above the dining table, the father's gaze pierces through you.
